connectors.label: Cancelled
connectors.value: JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Task Answers']['Values JSON']).has_key?('Status') && JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Task Answers']['Values JSON'])['Status'] == "Cancelled"

connectors.label: Not Cancelled
connectors.value: (JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Task Answers']['Values JSON']).has_key?('Status') && JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Task Answers']['Values JSON'])['Status'] != "Cancelled") || !JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Task Answers']['Values JSON']).has_key?('Status')

parameters.label: Input
parameters.value:
<%= outcome = "Completed"
if @results.has_key?('Status - Cancelled')
  outcome = "Cancelled"
elsif @results.has_key?('Status - Approval - Denied')
  outcome = "Denied"
end
outcome%>

parameters.value:
<%=
resolution= @results.has_key?('Retrieve Task Answers') ? JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Task Answers']['Values JSON'])['Resolution'] : "Request was denied."
{
  "Outcome" => @results['Outcome']['output'],
  "Resolution" => resolution
}.to_json%>

parameters.value:
<%={
  "Details": @results['Build Config']['Fulfillment Details'],
  "Confirmation Number": @submission['Handle'],
  "Date of Request": @submission['Created At'],
  "Service Category": @form['Name'],
  "Submission Id": @submission['Id'],
  "Description": @results['Build Config']['Fulfillment Summary']
}.to_json%>
